title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, no visual indication or change occurs.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo named 'Host:' when it is clicked.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the area containing the Combos.
3. Click on the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
